{{cpp/container/mdspan/layout_left/mapping/title|stride}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/layout_left/mapping/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr index_type stride(rank_type i) const noexcept;
}}
Returns the stride of the mapping at a rank index {{c|i}}. Equivalent to {{box|{{c/core|return extents().}}{{tti|fwd-prod-of-extents}}{{c/core|(i);}}}}.

{{cpp/enable_if|{{c|extents_type​::​rank() &gt; 0}} is {{c|true}}.}}

The behavior is undefined if {{c|1=i &gt;= extents_type::rank()}} is {{c|true}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|a rank index in the range {{range|0|extents_type::rank()}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The stride at a specified rank index.
